titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 448.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13652-13653)

bill.summary:
10/25/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2008 the tax deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.
